x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url http://localhost:8001/inputs/service/%7Bservice%7D/source/%7Bsource%7D \
  --header 'accept: application/json' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"data":{}}'

echo '{"data":{}}' |  \
  http POST http://localhost:8001/inputs/service/%7Bservice%7D/source/%7Bsource%7D \
  accept:application/json \
  content-type:application/json

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("localhost:8001")

payload = "{\"data\":{}}"

headers = {
    'accept': "application/json",
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/inputs/service/%7Bservice%7D/source/%7Bsource%7D", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_PORT => "8001",
  CURLOPT_URL => "http://localhost:8001/inputs/service/%7Bservice%7D/source/%7Bsource%7D",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"data\":{}}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "accept: application/json",
    "content-type: application/json"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

<?php

$request = new HttpRequest();
$request->setUrl('http://localhost:8001/inputs/service/%7Bservice%7D/source/%7Bsource%7D');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_METH_POST);

$request->setHeaders([
  'accept' => 'application/json',
  'content-type' => 'application/json'
]);

$request->setBody('{"data":{}}');

try {
  $response = $request->send();

  echo $response->getBody();
} catch (HttpException $ex) {
  echo $ex;
}

<?php

$client = new http\Client;
$request = new http\Client\Request;

$body = new http\Message\Body;
$body->append('{"data":{}}');

$request->setRequestUrl('http://localhost:8001/inputs/service/%7Bservice%7D/source/%7Bsource%7D');
$request->setRequestMethod('POST');
$request->setBody($body);

$request->setHeaders([
  'accept' => 'application/json',
  'content-type' => 'application/json'
]);

$client->enqueue($request)->send();
$response = $client->getResponse();

echo $response->getBody();

curl --request POST \
  --url http://localhost:8001/inputs/service/%7Bservice%7D/source/%7Bsource%7D/%7Bid%7D \
  --header 'accept: application/json' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"id":"string","status":{"code":0,"detail":"string"}}'

  http POST http://localhost:8001/inputs/service/%7Bservice%7D/source/%7Bsource%7D/%7Bid%7D \
  accept:application/json \

curl --request POST \
  --url http://localhost:8001/staging-jobs \
  --header 'accept: application/json' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"input_id":"string","input":{},"service":"string","source":"string","processing_id":"string"}'

echo '{"input_id":"string","input":{},"service":"string","source":"string","processing_id":"string"}' |  \
  http POST http://localhost:8001/staging-jobs \
  accept:application/json \
  content-type:application/json

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("localhost:8001")

payload = "{\"input_id\":\"string\",\"input\":{},\"service\":\"string\",\"source\":\"string\",\"processing_id\":\"string\"}"

headers = {
    'accept': "application/json",
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

  --url http://localhost:8001/staging-jobs/%7Bid%7D \
  --header 'accept: application/json' \

  accept:application/json \
  content-type:application/json

headers = {
    'accept': "application/json",
    'content-type': "application/json"
    }

curl --request /STAGING-JOBS/SERVICE/{SERVICE}/SOURCE/{SOURCE}/{ID} \
  --url http://localhost:8001/staging-jobs/%7Bid%7D
http /STAGING-JOBS/SERVICE/{SERVICE}/SOURCE/{SOURCE}/{ID} http://localhost:8001/staging-jobs/%7Bid%7D

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("localhost:8001")

conn.request("/STAGING-JOBS/SERVICE/{SERVICE}/SOURCE/{SOURCE}/{ID}", "/staging-jobs/%7Bid%7D")

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_PORT => "8001",
  CURLOPT_URL => "http://localhost:8001/staging-jobs/%7Bid%7D",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "/STAGING-JOBS/SERVICE/{SERVICE}/SOURCE/{SOURCE}/{ID}",
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

<?php

HttpRequest::methodRegister('/STAGING-JOBS/SERVICE/{SERVICE}/SOURCE/{SOURCE}/{ID}');
$request = new HttpRequest();
$request->setUrl('http://localhost:8001/staging-jobs/%7Bid%7D');
$request->setMethod(HttpRequest::HTTP_METH_/STAGING-JOBS/SERVICE/{SERVICE}/SOURCE/{SOURCE}/{ID});

try {
  $response = $request->send();

  echo $response->getBody();
} catch (HttpException $ex) {
  echo $ex;
}

<?php

$client = new http\Client;
$request = new http\Client\Request;

$request->setRequestUrl('http://localhost:8001/staging-jobs/%7Bid%7D');
$request->setRequestMethod('/STAGING-JOBS/SERVICE/{SERVICE}/SOURCE/{SOURCE}/{ID}');
$client->enqueue($request)->send();
$response = $client->getResponse();

echo $response->getBody();
